## `dplyr` Verbs

* `mutate` (returns one row to one row)
* `summarise` (returns one row to group)
* `select` (column filtering; akin to SQL SELECT)
* `filter` (row filtering; akin to SQL WHERE)
* `group_by`
* `ungroup`
* `rename`
* `arrange`

## `tidyr` Verbs

* `gather` (from wide to long)
* `spread` (from long to wide)
